title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements in detail. This includes the types of code repositories to be analyzed (e.g., public, private, open-source, hybrid), programming languages and frameworks to be supported (Python, Java, JavaScript, Ruby, C++, etc.), desired bug prediction accuracy (80% or higher with a focus on precision), required machine learning models (Logistic Regression, Random Forest, Neural Networks, SVM, Decision Trees, Ensemble Methods for improved performance), data collection methods (APIs, web scraping, code repositories integration), methods for handling large-scale repositories (partitioning, sampling, clustering), real-time processing capabilities, scalability strategies (cloud services, microservices architecture), security considerations such as data privacy and protection (encryption, anonymization, access controls), and any other relevant constraints or requirements. Also, document the expected performance metrics (e.g., precision, recall, F1 score, Area Under the ROC Curve) and the methodology for evaluating these metrics using cross-validation and a holdout test set, and consider incorporating techniques like stacking or boosting to improve model performance. Provide guidelines for model explainability to ensure understandable results.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and interactions between different modules, such as code analysis, machine learning model training, and bug prediction.

title: Develop Code Analysis Module
description: Implement the code analysis module responsible for parsing and analyzing code repositories, extracting relevant features, and preparing data for machine learning model training.

title: Build Machine Learning Model
description: Develop and train the machine learning model for bug prediction using the extracted code features and historical bug data.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for interacting with the bug prediction system, including code repository selection, bug prediction results visualization, and any other necessary features.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the project, including automated testing, building, and deployment to a staging or production environment.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite for the project, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the system's reliability and correctness.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a security audit of the system to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities, ensuring the system's security and data protection.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the project, including user guides, developer guides, and any other necessary documentation.

title: Deploy to Production
description: Deploy the bug prediction system to a production environment, ensuring it is properly configured, monitored, and maintained.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
